name: Tooyoou
overview:
Tooyoou is world’s first real time, self-serve home screen mobile advertising platform on Android OS.

For Android Device Owners:

Your Android smart phone’s home screen is valuable real estate.Tooyoou helps you turn that real estate into real money and reward points. You can use the Tooyoou app to place a personal billboard on your phone’s home screen and opt-in to home screen display Advertising. Tooyoou then negotiates with lots of advertisers to sell ads on your billboard. You see those ads - for cool new apps, cheap deals, local stores - plus you earn a portion of the money the advertisers pay. You can check your cash balance in real time, any time using the Tooyoou app, and Tooyoou will transfer that balance to you every month if balance accrued is $5.00 or more. You can also tell Tooyoou more info about yourself, which Tooyoou can use to sell your billboard for higher prices. That means over time you will see better ads and earn more money.

For Advertisers:

Tooyoou lets you communicate with potential customers directly on their smartphone’s home screen. With one click, these customers can download your app, receive your coupon offer, find directions to your store, dial your number, or browse your mobile page. You can deliver these messages precisely using Tooyoou’s advanced targeting features and self-serve advertising platform. You can start advertising on Tooyoou billboards for as low as CPC $0.05 and a minimum campaign budget of $20.

At Tooyoou - Mobile Advertising is different.
